predicate.note: Frames file for 'consume' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 39.4, no other framed members mentioned. Framenet entry Ingestion, framed members include eat. Comparison with eat.

example.name: active
example.text: The Miami fast-food chain, owned by Grand Metropolitan of Britain, expects *trace* to consume roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs annually.

roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs

example.name: passive, odd agent
example.text: While the vast bulk of it was indeed spent by reputable organizations on the good works it was raised for, it's equally true that a sizable hunk was consumed *trace* in ``expenses'' claimed by other operators, including fraudulent expenses.
example.arg: `` expenses '' claimed by other operators , including fraudulent expenses
